text: In case if I have a large file that is part of the transaction, the whitepaper mentions that it needs to be saved on a off-chain storage and a hash of it is stored within the block. The question is who would own that off-chain storage in the network ? How is immutability of it is taken care of ?
<@U11NUTP4L> in this case, you need other scheme (e.g., distributed storage) to save that file. Actually, blockchain is not designed for file storage.
